paste.description: Raw text of the paste or post

origin.description: Original source of the paste or post.

title.description: Title of the paste or post.

url.description: Link to the original source of the paste or post.

last-seen.description: When the paste has been accessible or seen for the last time.

first-seen.description: When the paste has been accessible or seen for the first time.

description: Paste or similar post from a website allowing to share privately or publicly posts.
name: paste
